ComicInfo.Title: Darkness, Once Gazed Upon Part Three
ComicInfo.Summary: The rescue continues! Chromia has led a team deep into Decepticon–controlled Iacon to rescue a captive Autobot, but how will they get out and back to Crystal City? Meanwhile, Cyclonus’s reunion with Provoke takes a new turn as a long-held secret is revealed!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 21:17:48. [CVDB903938]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Alex Milne, Blacky Shepherd, John-Paul Bove, Stefano Simeone
ComicInfo.Editor: David Mariotte, Riley Farmer, Tom Waltz
ComicInfo.Genre: Science Fiction, Action/Adventure, Movies & TV, Robots, Cyborgs & Mecha
ComicInfo.Characters: Arcee, Bumblebee, Catgut, Chromia, Codexa, Cyclonus, Deathsaurus, Elita-One, Flatline, Optimus Prime, Ravage, Roughstuff, Ruckus, Shockwave, Sixshot, Skytread, Skywarp, Smokescreen, Swindle, TrickDiamond, Ultra Magnus, Windblade
